docs.snippet: Everyday activities like brushing your teeth or drinking coffee are opportunities to be present and mindful....
docs.lead_paragraph: Everyday activities like brushing your teeth or drinking coffee are opportunities to be present and mindful.

headline.main: How to Have a Mindful New Year

docs.snippet: Indonesia's finance ministry sought on Wednesday to assure banks and research firms that they will not be sanctioned for their assessment of the country as long as it is "credible"....
docs.lead_paragraph: Indonesia's finance ministry sought on Wednesday to assure banks and research firms that they will not be sanctioned for their assessment of the country as long as it is "credible".

headline.main: Indonesia Tries to Assure Banks They Won't Be Penalized if Research Is 'Credible'
headline.print_headline: Indonesia Tries to Assure Banks They Won't Be Penalized if Research Is 'Credible'

docs.snippet: Iraqi journalist Afrah al-Qaisi, known in her country for criticizing the government in satirical articles for local media, has been released unharmed after being kidnapped by unidentified gunmen in Baghdad a week ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iraqi journalist Afrah al-Qaisi, known in her country for criticizing the government in satirical articles for local media, has been released unharmed after being kidnapped by unidentified gunmen in Baghdad a week ago.

headline.main: Kidnapped Iraqi Woman Journalist Released Unharmed After a Week
headline.print_headline: Kidnapped Iraqi Woman Journalist Released Unharmed After a Week

docs.snippet: Greek prosecutors have raided the Athens offices of Swiss drugmaker Novartis as part of a probe into bribery allegations, a court official told Reuters on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Greek prosecutors have raided the Athens offices of Swiss drugmaker Novartis as part of a probe into bribery allegations, a court official told Reuters on Wednesday.

headline.main: Greek Prosecutor Raids Novartis Athens Offices in Bribery Probe
headline.print_headline: Greek Prosecutor Raids Novartis Athens Offices in Bribery Probe

docs.snippet: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about today:...
docs.lead_paragraph: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about today:

docs.snippet: More than 2,000 Iraqis a day are fleeing Mosul, several hundred more each day than before U.S.-led coalition forces began a new phase of their battle to retake the city from Islamic State, the United Nations said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: More than 2,000 Iraqis a day are fleeing Mosul, several hundred more each day than before U.S.-led coalition forces began a new phase of their battle to retake the city from Islamic State, the United Nations said on Wednesday.

headline.main: More Than 2,000 Iraqis a Day Flee Mosul as Military Advances
headline.print_headline: More Than 2,000 Iraqis a Day Flee Mosul as Military Advances

docs.snippet: The Smithsonian's new National Museum of African American History and Culture is scheduled to start distributing tickets for April....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Smithsonian's new National Museum of African American History and Culture is scheduled to start distributing tickets for April.

headline.main: Smithsonian's African American Museum Opens April Ticketing
headline.print_headline: Smithsonian's African American Museum Opens April Ticketing

docs.snippet: Iraqi forces pressed gains against Islamic State militants in eastern Mosul on Wednesday and have retaken two more districts, security sources said, with thousands more civilians fleeing the fighting....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iraqi forces pressed gains against Islamic State militants in eastern Mosul on Wednesday and have retaken two more districts, security sources said, with thousands more civilians fleeing the fighting.

headline.main: Iraqi Forces Press Gains Against Islamic State in Eastern Mosul
headline.print_headline: Iraqi Forces Press Gains Against Islamic State in Eastern Mosul

docs.snippet: A French activist farmer facing potential prison time defended his aid to illegal African migrants in court Wednesday, calling it an act of humanity and not a crime....
docs.lead_paragraph: A French activist farmer facing potential prison time defended his aid to illegal African migrants in court Wednesday, calling it an act of humanity and not a crime.

headline.main: French Farmer Faces Risk of Prison for Helping Migrants
headline.print_headline: French Farmer Faces Risk of Prison for Helping Migrants

docs.snippet: South Africa and Australia will contest a four-test series for the first time in almost 50 years when they clash in March and April 2018, Cricket South Africa (CSA) announced on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: South Africa and Australia will contest a four-test series for the first time in almost 50 years when they clash in March and April 2018, Cricket South Africa (CSA) announced on Wednesday.

headline.main: South Africa and Australia to Clash in Rare Four-Test Series
headline.print_headline: South Africa and Australia to Clash in Rare Four-Test Series
